<source lang="xml">
<settings> 
  <redraw>1</redraw>

  <type>bar</type>
  
  <font>Tahoma</font>                
  <depth>20</depth>                  
  <angle>30</angle>                  
  
  <column>
    <width>70</width>                
    $if(growTime)$
    <grow_time>$growTime$</grow_time>
    $endif$         
    <grow_effect>strong</grow_effect>    
    <alpha>75</alpha>
    <balloon_text>          
    <![CDATA[{description}: {value}$unit$</b><br/>({series})]]> 
    </balloon_text>    
  </column>
     
  <balloon>
	<color>#ffffff</color>
	<text_color>#000000</text_color>
	<border_width>2</border_width>
	<border_color>#000000</border_color>
  </balloon>  
    <legend>             
	    <enabled>false</enabled> 
    </legend>    
    <values>
      <category>
        <rotate>30</rotate>
      </category>
      <value>
        <unit>$unit$</unit>
      </value>
    </values>
</settings>
</source>
